headline.main: News Summary and Index; The Major Events of the Day Section 1 International National Metropolitan

docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Dec. 23-- Drastic cutbacks in California's Medicaid program have gone into effect. In the opinion of many physicians and hospital officials here, the cutbacks will deprive millions of indigent Californians from obtaining all but emergency medical care for at least the next six months.

headline.main: Effect of Medicaid Cut on California's Poor Is Feared

docs.abstract: Drastic cutbacks in Calif's Medicaid program, ordered recently by Gov Reagan because of lack of funds, took effect Dec 15; many drs and hosp execs fear indigent will be barred from all but emergency med care for at least 6 mo; details
